Detailed Description

Structure containing parameters for DCC module configuration.

Field Documentation

uint32_t dccConfigParams::clkSrc0

Clock source for COUNT0 i.e. reference clock. Refer enum dccClkSrc0_t.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::clkSrc1

Clock source for COUNT1 i.e. clock signal to be tested. Refer enum #dccClkSrc1_t.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::mode

Mode of operation for DCC module. Refer enum dccOperationMode_t.

uint32_t dccConfigParams::seedSrc0

Preload value/seed value for COUNT0

uint32_t dccConfigParams::seedSrc1

Preload value/seed value for COUNT1

uint32_t dccConfigParams::seedValid0

Preload value/seed value for VALID0
